citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The program of veterinary care does not address veterinary care for the 2 Toucans or the 3 Finches. The program of
veterinary care must be updated to include avian species at this facility to ensure adequate veterinary care is provided.
CORRECT BY : 11/3/2023

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
An environmental enhancement plan for birds has not yet been developed for the 3 finches or the 2 toucans. Dealers,
exhibitors, and research facilities must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan for environment
enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of birds. The plan must be approved by the attending
veterinarian and must be in accordance with the regulations in this subpart and with currently accepted professional
standards . CORRECT BY : 11/3/2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The program of veterinary care does not address veterinary care for the 2 Toucans or the 3 Finches. The program of 
veterinary care must be updated to include avian species at this facility to ensure adequate veterinary care is provided. 
CORRECT  BY : 11/3/2023 
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
An environmental  enhancement plan for birds has not yet been developed  for the 3 finches or the 2 toucans. Dealers, 
exhibitors, and research facilities must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate  plan for environment 
enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of birds. The plan must be approved  by the attending 
veterinarian  and must be in accordance with the regulations in this subpart and with currently accepted professional 
standards . CORRECT BY : 11/3/2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
